Author: iznogoud
Date: 2007-09-01 04:37:00 +0200 (Sat, 01 Sep 2007)
New Revision: 838

Modified:
   trunk/ChangeLog
   trunk/glade/griffith.glade
   trunk/lib/config.py
   trunk/lib/gemail.py
   trunk/lib/preferences.py
   trunk/lib/widgets.py
Log:
Several changes on loan e-mail reminder system:
+ Loan E-mail reminder timeout implemented
+ Support for TLS smtp auth handshaking
+ Added smtp server port usage
+ Added gmail smtp server support

Modified: trunk/ChangeLog
===================================================================
--- trunk/ChangeLog	2007-08-31 00:59:30 UTC (rev 837)
+++ trunk/ChangeLog	2007-09-01 02:37:00 UTC (rev 838)
@@ -4,6 +4,13 @@
 ------------------
 (c) 2005-2007  Vasco Nunes, Piotr Ożarowski
 
+2007-09-01  Vasco Nunes
+	Several changes on loan e-mail reminder system:
+		+ Loan E-mail reminder timeout implemented
+		+ Support for TLS smtp auth handshaking
+		+ Added smtp server port usage
+		+ Added gmail smtp server support
+
 2007-08-31  Vasco Nunes
 	* Brazilian portuguese translation file updated

 # You may use and distribute this software under the terms of the
 # GNU General Public License, version 2 or later
 
+import socket
 import smtplib
 import gutils
 from gettext import gettext as _
 
-def mailto(self, server, auth, user, password, sender, to, subject, msg):
+socket.setdefaulttimeout(10)
+
+def mailto(self, tls, port, server, auth, user, password, sender, to, subject, msg):
 	"""
 	sends an email
 	"""
-	session = smtplib.SMTP(server)
-	session.set_debuglevel(1)
+	try:
+		session = smtplib.SMTP(server, port)
+		session.set_debuglevel(1)
+	except socket.timeout:
+		gutils.error(self, _("Connection timed out"), \
+			self.widgets['window'])
+		return()
+	if tls == True:
+		session.ehlo()
+		session.starttls()
+		session.ehlo()
 	if auth:
 		try:
 			session.login(user, password)
 		except:
-			gutils.info(self, _("Error sending e-mail: %s")%"login failure", \
+			gutils.error(self, _("Error sending e-mail: %s")%_("login failure"), \
 				self.widgets['window'])
 			return
 	headers = "From: %s\r\nTo: %s\r\nSubject: %s\r\n\r\n" \
 		% (sender, to, subject)
 	try:
 		smtpresult = session.sendmail(sender, to, headers+msg)
-		gutils.info(self, _("E-mail sent sucessuly"), self.widgets['window'])
+		gutils.info(self, _("E-mail sent sucessfuly"), self.widgets['window'])
 		return
 	except:
-		gutils.info(self, _("Error sending e-mail: %s")%"", self.widgets['window'])
+		gutils.error(self, _("Error sending e-mail: %s")%"", self.widgets['window'])
+		
+	session.quit()

 	if len(self.person_email):
